name: Kat Mail Delivery Service.
description:
Hello everyone!

This is a 2d platformer assignment about a cat in space that has a mail delivery service. 

the modification that I was able to make were:

  • Created a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.
  • Added multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in your game.
  • Reskin the existing graphics in some significant way, such as change the player or an enemy to a completely different character.
